text: Nan kam Timoti, gu fhum Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma ndu muunga kameŋ suaŋgi, gu ne ga ndɨrigi. Gu ne ga ndɨrɨgap, gu ndu muunga bigi bun ndu nzuai. Ndu mba Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ guma suaŋgi kameŋ, ndu fhura ne ganɨrim, ne ndu ndava khavɨri. Ndu khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip, mba tɨvi mbatɨgi phorgɨv shogɨp, nta mbevɨri.
